title: League Crash
body: Every time I get to the summoning platform, my computer crashes. I tried deleting and reinstalling it, but that still doesn't work.

replies.body: It has worked with windows 10 before.

Did you recently updated Windows 10?  There's been an issue where some players are crashing like this as a result of the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) not interacting properly with the game.  Try disabling that, and you should be good to go.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
